structured_data.description: This 3 bhk flat in sector 10 greater noida west is available in arihant abode for rent, one of the most prominent projects for residential flats in greater noida. Additionally, this property is in vicinity to important points of interest and is close to metro station. Property has 899 sq.Ft. Super built-Up area with 2 bathrooms & more than 3 balconies attached. This property is constructed on 1160 sq.Ft. You also get 1 covered parking inside the premises located on 11th of 22 floor. This is a ready to move property and it is 0-1 year old flat. It is a semi-Furnished property. Inclusive of 14 light, 5 fan, 2 wardrobe, 1 stove, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen and 1 chimney. Ready to occupy from thu, 25 sep 2025, this property is ideal for family on company lease with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. We are offering this property on  23,000 monthly and is negotiable.  23000 is required to be paid as the initial payment. You will also get all modern property feature like reserved parking, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm and feng shui / vaastu compliant. This place is equipped with quality features like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, cctv surveillance, lift(s), maintenance staff and visitor parking. Additional things included here are rain water harvesting and wheelchair friendly. Power backup: Full. The flat is north-East facing. The flat has marble flooring.
